UtilityBinoculars.name: Binoculars
UtilityBinoculars.description: An optical instrument used for viewing distant object.

UtilityHydrasWhisper.name: Hydra's Whisper
UtilityHydrasWhisper.description: This unique demolition tool is a long, metal tube packed with explosives. The Hydra's Whisper is designed to destroy out-of-reach movement impairing structures and detonate any mines along the lenght of the tube.

general: Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery
Destroys obstacles that can otherwise only be dismantled with Wrenches

UtilityHavocCharge.name: Havoc Charge
UtilityHavocCharge.description: A high-powered explosive charge that requires an accompanying detonator. The Havoc Charge is highly effective at demolishing large structures. The charge must be detonated via gunshot. The Havoc Charge's true potential is unleashed when executing strategic demolitions at safe distances.

AmmoFlamethrowerMoltenWind.name: "Molten Wind" v.II Ammo
AmmoFlamethrowerMoltenWind.description: Ammo for "Molten Wind" v.II Flame Torch

UtilityListeningKit.name: Listening Kit
UtilityListeningKit.description: A device used to intercept enemy radio broadcasts transmitted from nearby sources.

UtilityMetalBeam.name: Metal Beam
UtilityMetalBeam.description: Used to construct Metal Beam defenses.

UtilityRadioBackpack.name: Radio Backpack
UtilityRadioBackpack.description: Automatically gathers map intel periodically when equipped. The Radio Backpack is also used to transmit other sensitive information across long distances.

UtilityHavocDetonator.name: Havoc Charge Detonator
UtilityHavocDetonator.description: Required to detonate Havoc Charges. The Havoc Charge must be placed before can be deployed.

UtilitySatchel.name: Alligator Charge
UtilitySatchel.description: This heavy-duty explosive device is designed to deal significant damage to structures and stationary vehicles.

general: Can ruin structures that have been severly damaged by artillery

UtilityShovel.name: Shovel
UtilityShovel.description: A tool for digging Trenches and other entrenched structures.

UtilitySledgeHammer.name: Sledge Hammer
UtilitySledgeHammer.description: A tool used to salvage components from remains of old vehicles and equipment.

UtilityTripod.name: Tripod
UtilityTripod.description: A mount point for deployable infantry weapons and equipment.

UtilityWindSock.name: Wind Sock
UtilityWindSock.description: A sturdy fabric cylinder mounted on a tripod that's designed to help nearby operators determine the speed and direction of wind.

UtilityWrench.name: Wrench
UtilityWrench.description: A multipurpose tool. Can be used to dismantle mines/barbed wire and unlock vehicles.

UtilityBucket.name: Water Bucket
UtilityBucket.description: A bucket that holds water. You can toss water onto fires to extinguish them.

UtilityBayonet.name: Buckhorn CCQ-18
UtilityBayonet.description: Attached to the barrel of a rifle, this short blade can spear enemies in close quarters encounters.

UtilityGasFilter.name: Gas Mask Filter
UtilityGasFilter.description: When attached to a Gas Mask, this filter provides fresh air to the wearer.

UtilityOspreay.name: The Ospreay
UtilityOspreay.description: A rifle attachment that fires grenades with pneumatic force. Along with specialized grenades, it can launch standard grenades.
UtilityOspreay.ammoUsed: Green Ash Grenade, A3 Harpa Fragmentation Grenade, B2 Varsi Anti-Tank Grenade
